metadata.title: CVE-2022-1419 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The root cause of this vulnerability is that theioctl$DRM_IOCTL_MODE_DESTROY_DUMB can decrease refcount of*drm_vgem_gem_object *(created in *vgem_gem_dumb_create*) concurrently, and*vgem_gem_dumb_create *will access the freed drm_vgem_gem_object.
